content: It is difficult to satisfactorily predict COE prices for the Open Category, as the prices are determined through open bidding exercises conducted twice a month, and the price can fluctuate based on the demand. According to [[2](https://www.motorist.sg/article/330/11-factors-that-would-affect-coe-price-in-2019)], industry watchers expect COE prices to keep rising, possibly till 2023, after open category premiums hit S$99,999. However, as [[6](https://carbuyer.com.sg/2022-carbuyer-easy-guide-to-certificates-of-entitlement-coe/)], states once COE prices are in print, it is yesterday's news, and prices may change depending on the market behavior of the round that just passed. In general, if COE prices have gone up this round, they will likely go down on the next.
